Content.Text:
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, welcome to <GREEN>Chez Clement</GREEN>!
<PAGE>
May I take your order?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, oui!
I will prepare it immediately!
Please wait a little while.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Eh? Not ordering?
Well then, come another time.
